480.question: Do they report results only on English data?

1-Figure1-1.png: No, they also report results in US dollars.
2-Figure2-1.png: No, the results are reported on both English and Chinese data.

481.question: Do they report results only on English data?

7-Figure3-1.png: It is not possible to determine from the image and caption whether the results are only reported on English data.
7-Table3-1.png: The image does not provide any information about whether the results are reported only on English data.

489.question: What features are used to represent the salience and relative authority of entities?

6-Table2-1.png: The image and caption do not provide specific information about the features used to represent the salience and relative authority of entities.

489.answer:
Salience features positional features, occurrence frequency and the internal POS structure of the entity and the sentence it occurs in.
The relative authority of entity features:   comparative relevance of the news article to the different entities occurring in it.
